description.value: You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] a creature through sleight of hand rather than brute force. You can use Thievery instead of Athletics when you attempt a Disarm. When you use Thievery to attempt a Disarm and succeed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
